title: LOOKING FOR JUNGLER PLAT LEVEL RANKED 5s
body:
We have a team about to to obtain diamond border, need a jgler.

MUST BE AT LEAST PLAT, preferably diamond

Must be able to speak english and communicate effectively on skype.
need to be able to play during afternoons and and night.

replies.body:
I am diamond 4
IGN: Enkikx

I play jungle

champs:
- shaco (tank shaco)
- elise (ap bruiser)
- nocturne (full tank/full ad)
- skarner (full tank)
- I main rengar (full ad)
- eve (Bruiser/Full tank/Full ap)
- nidalee (Full ap)

I have a working skype account and I can speak fluent english
